Wait for many wasps to build up before you collect the shotgun. It's best against large swarms.
Pay attention to which items come with each structure. They can be key to your survival!
The pistol is extremely powerful. It doubles your damage for the rest of the run!
The shotgun has an obscene amount of firepower. Use it when you need to clean house!
You can only have two pistols at once. Collecting a second pistol doesn't help you.
